Hero.title: Trust from Farm to Table

HeroSection.title: Revolutionary Farmers
HeroSection.subtitle: Farm to Table Trust
HeroSection.description: Empowering farmers through blockchain-powered trust and transparency.

AboutUs.title: What is Revolutionary Farmers?
AboutUs.description: Revolutionary Farmers is a decentralized platform that provides trust and transparency in agricultural transactions using blockchain technology. We connect farmers with buyers, ensuring fair trade, secure transactions, and traceability of products.

smartContracts.title: Smart Contracts
smartContracts.description: Secure payments and transactions through blockchain technology.

trustSystem.title: Verified Trust System
trustSystem.description: Built-in reputation system for farmers and buyers.

Producers.title: Our Producers
Producers.description: Connect directly with those who grow fresh, local food. Explore products, learn stories and support your community.

ContactSection.title: Can't find the product you're looking for?
ContactSection.description: Get in touch with us or explore our network of trusted producers
ContactSection.emailBody:
Hello Revolutionary Farmers,

I am looking for a specific product that I couldn't find in your marketplace.

Product details:
- Product name: 
- Category: 
- Quantity needed: 
- Preferred delivery date: 

Additional notes:

Please let me know if you can help me find this product or connect me with a suitable producer.

Thank you for your assistance!

Best regards
